name: Kiran's Game
description:
Screen It Junior Videogame Winner 2018 (6 - 10 yo)

A boy is lost in a curious land. Can you imagine: Cupcakes falling from the sky? Fireballs shooting randomly? Can you help him get home? 

Created by Kiran S, Essington International School

Check out the Australian Centre for the Moving Image's Screen It competition  here.
